column6: Two new tales of Spidey's world by two new writers and the best artists in the business! First, Spider-Man must grapple with the grim spectre of defeat in a story by Sheldon Allen and Jim Cheung! Then, witness the life story of a man who'll one day be known as "Thug #1" by Scott Gimple and Stuart Immonen!
column8: | writer:Sheldon Allen | writer:Scott Gimple | penciller (cover):Mike Allred | penciller:Jim Cheung | penciller:Stuart Immonen
